DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to review cause of death in patients undergoing prostate brachytherapy at a single institution. Furthermore, we are analyzing patients undergoing androgen deprivation therapy and whether or not this contributed to cardiovascular deaths, specifically myocardial infarction.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Hormone Therapy on Heart Attack Incidence in Men Undergoing Prostate Brachytherapy
DOC.criteria: Deceased anytime after prostate brachytherapy treatment Patients whose cause of death was unable to be determined
